entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assert debugging `System.Private.CoreLib` in `DEBUG` build #108951
    10.0.0
  • [release/9.0][wasi/wasm] SimpleBuildDoesNotFail compares with the wrong expected value #108938
    9.0.0
  • [release/9.0][wasi/wasm] Expected the multithreading runtime pack to be available when running on CI (after branch stabilization) #108937
    9.0.0
  • DefineConstants are getting overriden twice in Wasi.Build.Tests.csproj #108935
  • Regression over .net 8.0 #108934
  • JIT: Interprocedural Analysis (IPA) in .NET 10 #108931
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `JsonElement.Parse` accelerator methods #108930
    10.0.0
  • Performance regression in `Vector<T>.Vector<T>(T)` on x86/x64 #108929
  • Intermittent AccessViolation and NullReference exceptions in reflection-based JsonSerializer #108926
  • Hashtable has lower hash flooding resistance than Dictionary #108923
  • [Mono] JSImportGenerator.Unit.Tests.Compiles.ValidateSnippets test fails with MissingMethodException #108922
  • `DebuggerTests` other than `WasmTestOnChrome` timeouts in CI #108921
  • AndroidStripILAfterAOT likely causing "InvalidProgramException: Invalid IL code in ..." #108920
  • Type initializer for CDSCollectionETWBCLProvider threw exception - NullReferenceException in InvokeStub_EventSourceAttribute.set_Guid #108919
  • Non-english languages bug in terminal in .Net 8 #108918
  • JIT: De-abstraction in .NET 10 #108913
    10.0.0
  • Runtime System.Private.CoreLib patches pdbs #108912

Closed

  • [mono][Perf] `Reflection.Invoke` and `Enum.Parse_Flags` Regressions on 4/11/2024 11:29:08 PM #104777
    9.0.0
  • [mono][Perf] TensorPrimitive `MaxMagnitude` and `Truncate` Regressions on 7/10/2024 10:56:31 PM #106475
    9.0.0
  • Enable arcade -sign functionality in runtime #108605
  • Impossible to use LINQ with System.Text.RegularExpressions.EnumerateMatches method in .NET 7.0+ #108940
  • `System.Double.IsRealNumber(System.Double.PositiveInfinity)` is true #103930
    Future
  • .net core is slow, net.9 even slower, especially BigInteger #108933
  • Process.StandardOutput.ReadAsync read data super slowly #108894
  • `IHostBuilder.UseConsoleLifetime` equivalent when using `IHostApplicationBuilder` #108865
    Future
  • System.Text.Json serializes both parent and child properties when using inheritance, even when new or override is used in the child class. #108890
  • Suggestion: Support Member Functions and Static Functions in C# Enumerations #108897

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix HostApiInvokerApp test app setting DllImportResolver for hostfxr #108954
    area-Host
  • Fix JIT refusing to inline methods accessing static readonly arrays #108953
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108952
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Allow the cdac build tool to roll forward to whatever SDK is available (prerelease or otherwise) #108946
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Ensure Vector.Create is properly recognized as intrinsic #108945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use `BitVec` with `bbPostorderNum` key to track visited blocks during value numbering #108943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update stepping through ExternalMethodFixup under the Debugger #108942
    area-VM-coreclr
  • ConditionalWeakTable - don't link Containers when no entries are transferred #108941
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix the ListenerElement.Attributes property #108936
    area-System.Configuration, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Track visited blocks in LSRA with post-order number-based `BitVec` #108932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Ensure a null PublicKey is supported on assembly refs #108928
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, regression-from-last-release, 9.0.0
  • Don't run trim-unfriendly ConcurrentDictionary test #108925
    area-System.Collections
  • Change the PAGE_SIZE to obtain from 'Environment.SystemPageSize' for CoreRoot testcases: 'MisSizedStructs_ArmArch' and 'Runtime_65937'. #108917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT: Break up try regions in `Compiler::fgMoveColdBlocks`, and fix contiguity later #108914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Remove single-use APIs from CoreCLR PALRT #108944
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable using -sign in VMR scenarios #108908
    area-Infrastructure
  • Automatically synthesize ilproj assembly names for tests #108730
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Remove static monitor helper functions #107667
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Stable branding for GA #108899
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #108871
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/9.0] fix guid version > 7 #108351
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime
  • Port NuGet Audit back to 9.0 #108854
    Servicing-approved
  • Rename Net5CompatImpl to CompatImpl #108881
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Ensure a null PublicKey is supported on assembly refs #108907
    area-VM-coreclr, regression-from-last-release, 10.0.0
  • Fix nativeaot outerloop #108916
    area-System.Globalization
  • Vectorize codegen for left shift operator on byte vector #108336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Consolidate LocateNativeCompiler target #103375
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasi] Remove unused string parameter from mono_wasm_load_runtime #104608
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Stop testing with V8 and `wasmconsole` #108711
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add ee_alloc_context (NativeAOT) #104851
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough checks in Compiler::TryLowerSwitchToBitTest #108106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • [cdac] ExecutionManager contract and RangeSectionMap lookup unit tests #108685
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move static helpers to managed #108167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Use loop-aware RPO for initial block layout #108903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement volatile barrier APIs #107843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move init class helpers to managed code #108029
    area-VM-coreclr
  • 2 accounting fixes #108880
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [wasi] Disable build in .NET 9 #108877
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoiding discarding exception details of `MissingMethodException` in `RuntimeType.CreateInstanceImpl` #108876
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add some missing docs in System #107726
    area-Meta
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2562151 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [CG] Bump Microsoft.IO.Redist to 6.0.1 #106102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • fix stack 2x2 tensor along dimension 1 #108620
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Avoid generic virtual dispatch for frozen collections alternate lookup #108732
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Remove redundant sign/zero extension for SIMD broadcasts #108824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add security design docs for Dictionary, HashCode, and StringComparer #108864
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Improve error message for TypedHttpClient missing constructor parameter #108670
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Fixed build error #108633
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Bump serialize-javascript #108883
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [browser] testing 4GB #108701
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Do not use link flags for bitcode compilation #108846
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser] disable debugger tests on CI #108178
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • System.Net Stress Tests Improvements 2 #108703
    area-System.Net
  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix SortedSet.IsSubsetOf (and friends) 102118 #102249
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeouts in CustomConverterTests #108879
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-16
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge to Oct 24 #2720
  • Audit all uses of ExecutableWriterHolder and ExecutableWriterHolderNo… #2719
    area-CoreclrInterpreter

Merged

  • Update SystemTextJsonToolsetVersion (#108704) #2715
    area-CoreclrInterpreter
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement stack traces on WASI via precise virtual unwinding #2697

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet watch` hard exits when it cannot launch browser (due to custom log formatting) in .NET 9 #44251
  • [NETSDKE2E]With net9RTM SDK isntalled, install wasm-toos/maui/aspire failed with error "Workload installation failed: Workload manifest dependency 'Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current' version '9.0.0-rtm.24513.1' is lower than version '9.0.0'" #44217

Closed

  • Installation Failure: ".NET SDK 8.0.403" on Windows 11 with Error "This app can't run on your PC" #43994
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.2xx` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #43674
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44114
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #44113
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/main` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #43815
  • Default Uri is wrong when dotnet publish docker image to insecure registry #43618
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.2.24470.13] Fail to build Text-Grab App with CS0116, CS1514, CS1022, CS0118, CS0103 error . #43680
  • Containers: extend environment variables for passing registry credentials #37606
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24379.15] Fail to build CleanArchitecture2 app with an error "CS0619:'MudMenu.OffsetY' is obsolete: 'Use AnchorOrigin or TransformOrigin instead.'" #42509
  • The framework [.../onnxruntime.framework] is a framework of static libraries, and will not be copied to the app #44161
  • Reenable Publish_HostedApp_WithRidSpecifiedAsArgument_NoSelfContained_Works #44210

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2562399 #44252
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44248
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44246
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44243
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Containers] Fix insecure registry handling to use the correct port for the HTTP protocol #44235
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] [Containers] Fix insecure registry handling to use the correct port for the HTTP protocol #44234
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make sure the quality is serialized as culture invariant #44232
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44212
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Merged

  • Port sdk-diff-tests and license-scan pipelines to 1ES pipeline templates #44238
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix "NETSDK1214" referring to existing diagnostic #44175
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44195
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Remove WorkloadManifestValidator stub project #43642
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [StaticWebAssets] Enable analyzers #44237
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove backported wpf patch #44236
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix port error when fallback to http #44050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Implement support for Aspire #43978
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • stabilize branding for release #44211
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44178
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • Add a -sign switch and enable signing for some legs #44207
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fine tune first join point and VMR support for it #44153
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand osx-arm64 test coverage #44008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove old source-build controls #43479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Workloads: Support VS component IDs #44198
    Servicing-consider
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Update Microsoft.NET.Sdk.StaticWebAssets.JSModules.targets #44160
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow Multi-Parsing of same file with different defines. #75537
  • Quick info on `field` exposes generated member name, unlike on accessors #75529
  • Nullable reference types in ValueTuples produce CS8619 when using non-null value #75526

Closed

  • Applicable attribute target keywords not recommended for primary constructor parameters #68399
    17.8 P4
  • Fix `Use auto property` does not update method arguments in property accessors #75516
    Backlog
  • csharpsourcegenerators.findreferencesforfilewithdefinitioninsourcegeneratedfile(false) #64721
    Backlog
  • It looks like GetDisposalInfoForEnumerator never reports diagnostics produced by TryFindDisposePatternMethod #73934
    Backlog
  • Confirm whether obsolete DisposeAsync should be reported #30257
    17.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Update source-build team references #75536
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • When replacing CodeStyle analyzers do not provide Features analyzers fallback options #75534
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove references to torn analyzers #75533
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix incremental parsing error with dot-dot tokens. #75532
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Remove comment for Obsolete on Index or Range #75531
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged

Merged

  • Revert "Update BuildHost STJ to 8.0.4" #75528
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75440
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add new IRazorMappingService to replace IRazorSpanMappingService #75524
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Cherry pick #75515 #75535
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix keyword recommending in record parameter attributes #75520
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove LittleEndian asserts #75159
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Platform - Mono CoreClr, Next
  • docs: Fix "Augment user code" example #75041
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Also compare other properties when remove block spans #75515
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Revert "Update BuildHost STJ to 8.0.4" #75530
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix servicehub symbol package name #75525
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'use auto property' when field is passed as method argument #75519
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Clarify the compiler's policy towards well-known types/members #75522
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Report diagnostics from `TryFindDisposePatternMethod` when binding `foreach` loop #75422
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add warning when property has a backing field but a manually implemented accessor does not use it #75325
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Do not crash server if we fail to determine language for non-mutating request #75509
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75541
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Change commit to async when enter is pressed #75335
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Skip tests on Mono #75160
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Platform - Mono CoreClr
  • Respect [MemberNotNull] on local functions #75448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: nullable analysis of spread element expression #74686
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.12
  • VB: Do not use overload resolution for expression tree conversion #75490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Put TArg before callbacks #74370
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EditorConfig comments cannot follow a property value #51625
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config, VSCode
  • Revert "Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding (#64928)" #75406
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow suppressing foreach iteration variable nullability mismatch #75432
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Run binary SDL once on all artifacts #75502
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #58468
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextSansFilter #58467
  • [ASP.NET] We need to get the set of analyzer rules in dotnet/sdk sync with dotnet/aspnetcore #58463
  • UseForwardedHeaders should raise more prominent errors for unknown proxies #58461
  • JDK zip not found when running `.\eng\scripts\InstallJdk.ps1` #58457
  • OIDC middleware will not use forwarded headers in challenge construction #58455
  • JSInterop Exception in Published Blazor WebAssembly App (Server Mode) #58454
  • Perf regression: https #58452
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, multiple_queries, plaintext #58451

Closed

  • [PERF] Lighthouse benchmarks failing #58424
    9.0.0
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, multiple_queries #58371
  • JSInterop Exception in Published Blazor WebAssembly App (Server Mode) #58453
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plaintext, updates #58404
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #58446
  • OnAfterRenderAsync Not Triggered After Migrating to Blazor Web App with Server Interactive Render Mode in .NET 8 #58438

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] bumping ws dependency to fix component vulnerability #58458

  • [release/9.0] [Infrastructure] Updated npm packages #58469

  • Move Windows.Amd64.VS2022.Pre.Open to Helix-Matrix #58460
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Update global.json to 10.0 sdk #58425
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix flaky Http2WebSocket Kestrel test #58448
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Remove bulk disables of CA warnings #58428
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Revert trimming test workarounds #58272
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Description to ProducesResponseType (and others) for better OpenAPI document creation #58193
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-16
entry.content:

Closed

  • How to draw a line or create any image #25310

Created

    area-layout, community ✨

    area-testing
  • [Testing] Implement Pan method to UITest extension methods #25312
    area-testing

Merged

  • [Documentation] Fix TitleBar comment mistake #25243

    .NET 9.0 GA

Updated

  • HybridWebView: Invoke .NET methods from JavaScript #25077
    area-controls-hybridwebview, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Increment build targets to iOS 18 #25140
    do-not-merge, .NET 8 SR10
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • Source Generation for XAML #24865
    area-xaml
  • Initialize ResourceDictionaryHelpers.SetAndLoadSource when XAML Hot Reload is enabled #25304

  • [android] Fallback to default icons in SearchHandler #25067
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011

  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997

  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • Fix for Frame PanGestureRecognizer is not working in Android #25239

  • [iOS] Ensure disconnected ItemsViewHandler doesn't hold onto the items source #24610

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tools: Use either UseSeeding or UseAsyncSeeding #34923
    Backlog
  • GroupBy over entity type: stop including all columns #34921
    Backlog
  • Add database lock timeout without any default #34916
    Backlog

Closed

  • Raw SQL literal with GO on a new line of that literal fails when executing migration #32826
    10.0.0
  • EFCore 9 rc1 - sql server - Problem with type mapping during linq to sqlexpression translation #34900
    10.0.0
  • In ObservableBackedBindingList ListChanged event when adding items is fired before backed collection is changed #34913
  • InvalidOperationException: More than twenty 'IServiceProvider' instances have been created for internal use by Entity Framework #34918
  • Final GroupBy on an entity type adds orderings for all of its properties #34895
  • Issue: Entity Framework Does Not Support Geospatial Coordinates in Oracle #34919
  • Runtime error after updating to 8.0.10 #34875
    8.0.11
  • `NullReferenceException` for a custom `ValueConverter` in EF Core 9 RC 1. #34760
    9.0.0
  • EF Core 8.0.3 produces incorrect idempotent migration script #33337
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Fix Cosmos enum partition keys #34922
    Servicing-approved

Merged

  • Rewrite SearchConditionConverter #34905
  • Don't remove quoted 'GO' lines #34917
  • Use matching type mapping when translating `BoolSwitch` #34906
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34890

Updated

  • Expose SQLite VFS option in connection string #34864
  • Solves the problem of getting project MSBuild information #34574
  • Lift try..catch out of an expression and replace with a temporary variable #34912
